author: pbs.org
title: October 23 Preview: The Cast of Crimson Peak Charlie Rose The Week
text: On the show this week, the cast of the new gothic romance film "Crimson Peak," directed by Guillermo del Toro, join Charlie Rose. Tom Hiddleston speaks about working with costars Jessica Chastain and Mia Wasikowska.
